The-Ruination-of-Centhris.name: The Ruination of Centhris
description: The Ruination of Centhris was a major world event which marked the end of the Utharian Empire and the descent of Centhris into a long, violent dark age.

The End of a Golden Age: Historical scholars date the Ruination of Centhris as occurring in the year 2C 837, or roughly 1,740 years ago. It acted as a definitive end to the Utharian Empire, which, at the time, was in the midst of a Golden Age of magical achievement and prosperity.
